processingCommand.script:
:IF &WMS_BACKUP# = "false"
: SET &WMS_BACKUP_FILE# = ""
:ENDIF

:IF &REFS_BACKUP# = "false"
: SET &REFS_BACKUP_FILE# = ""
:ENDIF

:IF &EMS_BACKUP# = "false"
: SET &EMS_BACKUP_FILE# = ""
:ENDIF

:IF &RW_BACKUP# = "false"
: SET &RW_BACKUP_FILE# = ""
:ENDIF

:IF &WMS_FAIL_BACKUP# = "false"
: SET &WMS_FAIL_BACKUP_FILE# = ""
:ENDIF

:IF &REFS_FAIL_BACKUP# = "false"
: SET &REFS_FAIL_BACKUP_FILE# = ""
:ENDIF

:IF &EMS_FAIL_BACKUP# = "false"
: SET &EMS_FAIL_BACKUP_FILE# = ""
:ENDIF

:IF &RW_FAIL_BACKUP# = "false"
: SET &RW_FAIL_BACKUP_FILE# = ""
:ENDIF

:SET &BACKUPS# = STR_CAT(&BACKUPS#, ",&INSTANCE_NAME#,&WMS_BACKUP_FILE#,&REFS_BACKUP_FILE#,&EMS_BACKUP_FILE#,&RW_BACKUP_FILE#,&WMS_FAIL_BACKUP_FILE#,&REFS_FAIL_BACKUP_FILE#,&EMS_FAIL_BACKUP_FILE#,&RW_FAIL_BACKUP_FILE#")
:PUBLISH &BACKUPS#,,TOP
